signature.description: Sign in With Ethereum message signature as bytes

domain.description: Domain of the application requesting the signature, e.g. 'wallet-link.stellz.club'

address.description: Ethereum address in 0x-prefixed, checksummed hex format

statement.description: The message shown to the user in their wallet before signing, which MUST be of the format 'Prove control of ${address} to link it to ${did}', where ${address} is the linked Ethereum address in 0x-prefixed, checksummed hex format, and ${did} is the DID of the user.

uri.description: URI of the application requesting the signature, e.g. 'https://wallet-link.stellz.club'

version.description: Sign in With Ethereum message version

chainId.description: Chain ID of the Ethereum VM network the address is on

nonce.description: Random nonce the message was signed with

issuedAt.description: Timestamp when the message was signed
